channel.title: Item drop on death help
channel.description: When people die on the server, their items do not drop. Example: I die in full rune, I keep everything, skulled or not skulled how can I fix that?

item.title: Item drop on death help
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“Benjamin1160, post:1, topic:425559”]When people die on the server, their items do not drop.
Example: I die in full rune, I keep everything, skulled or not skulled how can I fix that?[/quote]
try die with a normal player, im sure owner loses items and the other player doesnt get, but it does work?

Read full topic
